name: market for packaging, for pesticides | packaging, for pesticides | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19758/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This dataset is a market dataset for packaging, for pesticides, which accounts for the delivery (transportation expenditures) of the packaging to the datsets consuming it.;The reference product refers to the amount of pesticide packed, not the amount of packaging material.;Default transportation values are used for plastic products from their production site to the site where they are filled with pesticides. Default transportation values are used for fertilisers from the site where the packaging is filled with pesticides till the farm that are finally used.

The activity starts right after the production of the packaging, for pesticides.

The activity ends with the provision of the packaging, for pesticides, to its users.
category: C:Manufacturing/22:Manufacture of rubber and plastics products/222:Manufacture of plastics products/2220:Manufacture of plastics products

This transportation distance accounts for the transportation necessary for plastic products (material of packaging) and the transportation that takes place from the pesticide production plant until the farm that is used. This transport distance is multiplied with the amount of plastic for packaging
